oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry Network Broadcast - 1955-01-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is of the Grand Ole Opry radio show on January 29, 1955. The tape features performers like: Hank Snow, Goldie Hill, Del Wood, Grandpa Jones, Rod Brasfield, and Minnie Pearl. This tape is thirty-one of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Grant Turner; Goldie Hill; Rod Brasfield; Del Wood; Grandpa Jones; Minnie Pearl;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) The end of a commercial -- (00:13) Martha White flour commercial -- (00:45) Commercial for Harvey's -- (01:05) Grand Ole Opry program begins -- (01:12) I'm Moving On (Hank Snow) -- (03:04) Preview of the show's line up -- (03:44) Rod Brasfield skit -- (07:35) Prince Albert (P.A.) tobacco commercial with Grant Turner and Hank Snow -- (08:43) Snow introduces Goldie Hill -- (09:00) Hill and Snow talk - (09:16) Treat Me Kind (Goldie Hill) -- (11:52) Farther Along (Hank Snow) -- (14:24) P.A. tobacco commercial -- (15:31) Listen to the Mockingbird (Del Wood) -- (17:02) Snow introduces Minnie Pearl -- (17:31) Minnie Pearl skit -- (18:43) Rod Brasfield joins Minnie Pearl on stage -- (22:04) Snow reintroduces Hill -- (22:25) Please Don't Betray Me (Goldie Hill) -- (24:18) Cindy (Grandpa Jones) -- (26:00) Commercial for United States saving bonds -- (26:21) Snow introduces next song -- (26:38) Let Me Go Lover (Hank Snow) -- (28:58) Snow previews next week's show and good bye
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank; Hill, Goldie; Wood, Del; Minnie Pearl; Grandpa Jones; Grandpa Jones, 1913-1998; Brasfield, Rod; Brasfield, Rod, 1910-1958; Turner, Grant; Grand Ole Opry (Radio program);
